## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHIP2, ATTDX, HIP, TDX</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA HSP70-INTERACTING PROTEIN 2, tetraticopeptide domain-containing thioredoxin, HSC-70 INTERACTING PROTEIN, tetraticopeptide domain-containing thioredoxin
- **Description:**   tetraticopeptide domain-containing thioredoxin;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
